chapter.title: Name Lookup Functions
chapter.para: This chapter covers the available name lookup functions. These functions can look up a server/service name and return information about that server/service.

section.title: SysGetservbyname
section.para: This function uses the getservbyname() C API to perform the action.

listitem.para: The protocol name, usually TCP or UDP.

An option specifying the information to return. The values are all case insensitive and only the first letter of the option value is checked. Allowed values are:
"NAME"
The service name.
"PORT"
The service port number.
"Aliases"
The services alias names are returned in an array.

section.para: Returns information specified by the option.
